lines.text:
[the Sheriff is roughly restraining Sam by forcing his face on the ground with his boot]
Officer, let him up. He's not hurting anyone.

[lets Sam go]
But he could be. He bears a sinister resemblance to a vicious criminal that's been marauding the area.
And since when is it a crime to look like somebody?
Hey, what'd the guy do anyway?
Dine and dash. I'm gonna let you go with a warning this time.

[aims a gun at Joe]
You don't realize what's happening, do you? 'Cause if you did, you'd be shittin' in your shoes, wouldn't you? Quaking with fear? I want ya to look around, just look around, and tell me what you see. A society that's obsessed with feeling good and happy. But underneath that moronic veneer lurks a thirst for blood. Yes, my friend, an invidious potential for lawlessness and despair; existential and otherwise. The sooner you weasels open your eyes to the hideous truth, the sooner you wish you were dead.
Would any of you guys happen to have a roman candle on you?
Lovely day. Bit warm to be sitting in the middle of the desert, though.
I know. My friend broke down.
Yeah, uh... what do you need?
Well, I got a lot of fix-it paraphernalia back at my place.

Champagne... and speed kills. Or worse... it makes you psychotic. People love it because it makes them feel like they're in control of their destiny. What you wanna be on the look-out for is transcendent reality; seeing in and seeing out.
So what do you guys do?

[holding a plastic beer holder]
Hey, why is this instrument of potential torture still in tact?
It's your responsibility as campers, and honourable men on this planet, to cut through the connections of these nooses waiting to happen before discarding them in a proper refuse container.
What the fuck are you talkin' about?
Oh, don't mind him. It's called gallows humour.
Only if you're in love and waiting to die. My name's Oscar, this is my wife Celeste. I've got cancer, she's got AIDs.
You're just a couple of self-indulgent pussies burrowing into your own stupid little cocoons. You probably love that "don't worry, be happy" song.
There's a whole world changing out there. If you wanna die in the vine of the implying decline, it's up to you.
All you got is yourself. And yourself is inside you body. And your body is your own.
Hey, you want to come with me to El Dorado?

[laughs]
The legendary city of gold, conquistador?
Maybe some other time. I got to stick to my schedule.
This is Miss Labia Mirage, and she's dancing her way to the Yukon.
You know what they say, conquistador... stick with the one who can see the truth of your soul. Don't take any wooden nickels.
You want life to mean something, and be real and stuff. But then you just get old... and get a job.
